page.title: 06SHETLAND'S KNITTING INDUSTRY
page.content: IN A SURVEY IN P.4 AND UP, WE FOUND THAT{14%}OF CHILDREN'S PARENTS KNITTED TO SELL, AND{32%}OF THEIR GRANDPARENTS KNITTED TO SELL TO LOCAL SHOPS. SHOPS CODE NUMBER {SHETLAND FASHIONS 1,2,3 {JAMIESONS 1,2,3 {TULLOCHS OF SHETLAND 1,2,3 {KLOOKNIT 2,4 {ANDERSONS 2,3 {L&M ANDERSONS 2,3 {SPINNING WHEEL 2,3 {PEERIE SHOP 2,4 {WORKSHOP GALLERY 2,4 {THULE KNIT 2,6 {SOUVENIR SHOP 1,2,3 {WOOL BROKERS 1,2} {JUDANE 2,5 SELL WOOL=1 SELL KNITWEAR=2 BUY KNIT=3 GIVE WOOL TO BE KNITTED=4 MANUFACTURE ON PREMISES=5 GIVE WOOL TO BE MACHINE KNITTED=6
